description:
On January 24, 2013, I launched the Video Creators channel with 0 subscribers. Twelve months and 12 days later the channel crossed 10,000 subscribers.

Today the channel is growing at twice that rate and continues to increase month over month! Why?

Some of it is due to what you'd expect: solid content, optimizing the videos to rank well in search results, engaging an audience, things like that.

But there's so much more that I implemented behind the scenes that really contributed to the channel's growth, things that are mostly invisible to viewers.

This online course is about how Video Creators went from 0 to 10,000 subscribers in 12 months and how you can do it better!

In this online course I share all my behind the scenes tactics so you can implement them and to see even better results than I did!

These tactics aren't just good ideas that might theoretically work. These are tactics have proven themselves to grow my channel and the channels of many of my clients. They're tried, true, and tested. And best of all, none of them require spending a dime for promotion!

Now I'm sharing these tactics with you so your channel can grow more quickly and reach the people who need to hear the message you're spreading on YouTube.
title: Zero to 10,000 YouTube Subscribers in 12 Months
